41.ara-name: كتاب العلم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever is asked about some knowledge that he knows, then he conceals it, he will be bridled with bridle of fire

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كِتْمَانِ الْعِلْمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Concealing Knowledge
